item.description:
Hi All,

This meetup is actually the 4th Sunday of the month to give people a little extra time - also August is funky and has 5 Sundays. Hope to see many of you there! Also please remember that we ask for a $1 donation.

Cheryl


P.S. - The book is on the bargain table at Brookline Booksmith for $5.99! There are plenty of copies.
item.how_to_find_us: I will be at a table with my copy of the book.

group.name: The Brookline Book Club Meetup Group

item.name: August Meetup: The Namesake by Jhumpa Lahiri
